item.title: ICIS18 workshop
item.description: Tools for open science! Join us today to learn about R, RMarkdown, the tidyverse, and the open science framework. All materials here: https://t.co/PVEeLDb4nT - stop in whenever would be useful (don’t worry if you didn’t register). #ICIS18 pic.twitter.com/AAcO1Yr3ub — Michael C. Frank (@mcxfrank) June 30, 2018
